product_name: FalconGuides Hiking Great Smoky Mountains National Park - 2nd Edition
long_description: From the FalconGuides series, the updated edition of Hiking Great Smoky Mountains National Park guides you along scenic trails through the Smoky Mountains of both Tennessee and North Carolina.
short_description: From the FalconGuides series, the updated edition of Hiking Great Smoky Mountains National Park guides you along scenic trails through the Smoky Mountains of both Tennessee and North Carolina.
